tools.name: list_figma_components
tools.description: List all available Figma components that can be generated into React code. Use this to see what components are available from the design team.

search.description: Optional search term to filter components (e.g., 'button', 'card', 'nav')

tools.name: create_figma_component
tools.description: Generate a React component from a Figma design and save it to the specified location. This is the main tool for converting Figma designs to code.

componentName.description: Name of the Figma component to generate (e.g., 'LoginButton', 'ProductCard', 'NavigationBar')

outputPath.description: Directory path where the component should be created (e.g., 'src/components/', 'components/ui/')

typescript.description: Generate TypeScript code with type definitions

styling.description: Styling approach to use for the component

componentNaming.description: Naming convention for the generated component

createStorybook.description: Generate Storybook story file for the component

createTests.description: Generate test file for the component

tools.name: preview_figma_component
tools.description: Preview the generated React code for a Figma component without creating files. Useful for reviewing before creating.

componentName.description: Name of the Figma component to preview

tools.name: search_figma_components
tools.description: Search for Figma components by name or partial match. Useful when you're not sure of the exact component name.

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return

tools.name: extract_design_tokens
tools.description: Extract design tokens (colors, typography, spacing) from Figma components and generate CSS variables or design system files.

componentName.description: Name of the Figma component to extract tokens from, or 'all' for all components

outputPath.description: Path where design tokens should be saved

tokenTypes.description: Types of design tokens to extract

tools.name: create_component_library
tools.description: Generate multiple React components from Figma at once, creating a complete component library with consistent structure.

componentNames.description: List of Figma component names to generate (e.g., ['Button', 'Card', 'Input'])

outputPath.description: Base directory for the component library

styling.description: Consistent styling approach for all components

createIndex.description: Create index.ts file to export all components

createStorybook.description: Generate Storybook stories for all components

extractTokens.description: Extract and generate design tokens file
